page.title: 16A Day In The Life Of My Mum
page.content: My Mum gets up at 6am in the morning to see my dad off to work.He works at Geevor Tin mines.When dad has gone to work she has a cup of coffee then she makes sandwiches for my two brothers and me for school.At 7.45 she wakes us up for school then she gets us breakf_ ast.When we have gone to school she do _es the dishes and makes the beds and tidies the house up.She starts work at 9am on Monday,Tuesday,and Thursday.She goes out to work as a home help. She visits old people and does their work for them, chats to them or cooks their meals for them.She likes old people and says most of them are very nice.On Wednesdays and Fridays she is a hairdresser.People come to have their hair done.She likes this job best.She usually finishes work at 3.30 then she makes tea.Before she goes to bed she makes my dad's sandwiches.
